oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Johnson Brothers Radio Show - WAVU - Tape 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording is of the Johnson Brothers Radio Show for the WAVU radio station of Albertville, Alabama. Tape is labeled part four of an unidentified number of tapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Johnson Brothers String Band
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Snowbird in the Ashbank (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (00:00) Rass Johnson (unconfirmed) introduces Jesse Johnson (unconfirmed) to perform a commercial spot for Hunter's Food Store and J. B. Roberts and Son -- (02:41) Time (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (05:13) Jesse performs a commercial spot for J. B. Roberts and Son -- (06:06) Rass introduces "Who at My Door" -- (06:41) Who at My Door (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (09:15) Rass introduces "Marilla's Lesson" (unconfirmed) -- (09:44) Marilla's Lesson [unconfirmed] (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (11:22) Rass invites Jesse to perform a commercial spot for J. B. Roberts and Son -- (12:31) Rass introduces "Oh, You Beautiful Doll" -- (13:01) Oh, You Beautiful Doll (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (15:09) Rass attempts to introduce "Cripple Creek" -- (15:55) Cripple Creek (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (16:53) Cripple Creek [featuring Jesse Johnson outro] (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (17:39) Jesse commercial spot for the National Safety Council -- (17:57) Jesse states the time -- (18:07) An unidentified voice briefly addresses a woman named Caroline -- (18:10) (Unidentified fiddle tune) (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (19:37) Rass reflects on square-dancing, and Jesse performs a commercial spot for J. B. Roberts and Son -- (21:14) I Feel Like Traveling on (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (23:06) Burt Johnson (unconfirmed) and Rass joke about Rass's vocals -- (23:29) Little Brown Jug (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (25:00) Rass introduces "Mockin' Bird Hill" -- (25:59) Mockin' Bird Hill (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (27:43) Rass jokes about waiting - -(27:53) Jesse performs a commercial spot for J. B. Roberts and Son -- (28:23) Coconut Grove (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (30:01) Rass introduces "In the Mood" -- (30:19) In the Mood (Johnson Brothers String Band) -- (31:39) Rass says goodbye to the audience -- (31:49) (Unidentified fiddle tune) [featuring Jesse Johnson outro] (Johnson Brothers String Band)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Johnson Brothers String Band (Musical group);
